SntHostings: E5 with 64GB of RAM, 1TB Disk, 5TB Bandwidth for $84/mo in Los Angeles!

california, cheap dedicated server, dedicated server, la, los angeles, rdp, seedbox, snthostings, USA August 12, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Welcome, SntHostings!  They’re new to our community and are debuting with a cheap dedicated server offer in Los Angeles:

  • $84 will get you an E5-2670 with 64GB of RAM, 1TB SSD drive, and 5TB of bandwidth in LA!

SntHostings also has a full line of offerings: seedboxes, Windows RDP services, VPS, and other dedicated server offerings.  Many of these services are available in specialized offerings such as encoding and Forex systems.

They’ve been in business since 2013 and if you check out their timeline you can see that they’ve been slowly growing their business and expanding their range of offerings.

Their WHOIS is public. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Credit & Debit Card, Paypal, Perfect Money, Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Webmoney.

Here’s a little about SntHostings in their own words:

SnTHostings was started back in 2013, and since then we have had only 1 intention, to provide quality service at a very very challenging rate, first, we achieved this in the Seedbox field, then RDP, And now we are doing it in Dedicated Server. I do not think there is any company out there giving out Dual E5-2670 with 64GB Ram & SSD at the price we are. In the past 8.5yrs, we expanded, and even now we are expanding, currently, we provide only 1 configuration at this crazy price, but soon we will have more.

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Now read more to see the offers!

Dedicated Server Offer

  • 2x Intel Xeon E5-2670 CPU
  • 64GB RAM
  • 1TB SSD (More available in customization)
  • 1Gbps uplink (More available in customization)
  • 5TB Transfer (More available in customization)
  • 1x IPv4 (More available in customization)
  • IPMI: Yes (On Request)
  • $84/month (Coupon: SnT-LEB-FTW)
  • $79.99/mo if paid upfront for a year. (Coupon: SnT-LEB-FTW-YR)
  • [ORDER]

NETWORK INFO:

  • Los Angeles, California, USA
  • Test IPv4: 103.153.182.1
  • Looking glass: http://dedicated.snthostings.com:8080/

HOST NODE INFO:

Please let us know if you have any questions/comments and enjoy!
